# Developers

This is a VuePress project, written in Markdown.

Install VuePress by running yarn global add vuepress@next or npm install -g vuepress@next

Then from this project directory, run yarn install or npm install

Run vuepress dev to run locally, vuepress build to build static files for deployment.

VuePress Guide
